name: marketplace-pro
description: Advanced plugin marketplace platform with intent-based composition, supply chain security, contextual intelligence, dev studio hot-reload, and federated registry protocol. Transforms the marketplace from a package manager into an enterprise orchestration platform.

composition-engine.description: Intent-based plugin DAG resolution with greedy set cover and Kahn's toposort

supply-chain-security.description: Sigstore signing, permission sandboxing, and composite trust scoring

contextual-intelligence.description: Project fingerprinting with Apriori association mining and cosine similarity

dev-studio.description: Hot-reload development server with visual dependency graphs

federation.description: Multi-registry protocol with GitOps lockfile and policy enforcement
